pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Weather-State Approach Conditionally Skew-Normal Generator // Multivariate weather generator for daily climate variables based on weather-states using a Markov chain for modeling the succession of weather states. Conditionally to the weather states, the multivariate variables are modeled using the family of Complete Skew-Normal distributions. Parameters are estimated on measured series. Data must include the variable 'Rain' and can accept as many other variables as desired.
